mapper.select: SELECT a.STS_DESC_ID, a.spec_type, a.net_type, TO_CHAR(a.sts_date,'YYYY-MM-DD') AS STS_DATE, TO_CHAR(a.CREATE_TIME,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:mi:ss') AS CREATE_TIME, a.AREA_ID, a.STS_PERIOD, b.NAME areaname from RNO_GSM_STS_DESCRIPTOR a, RNO_SYS_AREA b WHERE a.AREA_ID=b.ID AND STS_DESC_ID in (${configIds})

select distinct(cell), avg(${fieldName}) as avgValue, max(${fieldName}) as maxValue, min(${fieldName}) as minValue, count(${fieldName}) as cnt from RNO_GSM_STS where DESCRIPTOR_ID IN (${buf}) group by cell
